title: Electron Gunner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Ionize a player each full moon night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: *Overloaded* — When you ionize a player, the next night, their ability has a 50% chance to fail. If it doesn't, it targets every player in the game and they're roleblock and redirect immune. Either way, they are then informed it was because they were ionized.

desc:
Post 3738
*And I went like— zap zap! And he went like— BBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRgzgzgzgzgzDDRAAAAAAAAAAAAccckkkkkkkkbbbbbbBBBBBBBBBBOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM!!!!!*
